name: CCRyder's Smoker Rib Rub
author: ccryder81
summary: This is a blend of spices I use to rub onto baby back ribs the night before I smoke the meat.  Store in an airtight container at room temperature until ready to use.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons New Mexico red chile powder
1 tablespoon dried thyme, or more to taste
1 tablespoon ground cumin, or more to taste
1 tablespoon ground nutmeg, or more to taste
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Mix white sugar, brown sugar, sea salt, red chile powder, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, ancho chile powder, black pepper, thyme, cumin, rosemary, nutmeg, allspice, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
Rub generously onto ribs or meat of your choice
Cover and refrigerate meat 8 hours to overnight before smoking
